trix parallel processing

n a cooperative 
manner.
> Typically, multiple machines crawls are done by =
segmenting the 
crawl scope.

e crawl machines.

ng a 
posibility, but

ing the KB/sec is not limited by politness rules) the

pable of (in my experiance) going as high 21.1 Mbits/sec (over 
a

 of

oading a lot

h 
usage 
> drops,
> > since each text document is subjected to link extrac=
tion that 
> takes time.

d for the 24 hour 
> period cited
> > above was approx. 57 docs/sec. (about=
 5 million docs and 214GB of
> > uncompressed data in 24 hours).

> > =
The hardware in question includes dual Xeon processors and 2 
gigs 
> worth=
 of
> > memory (+ abundant disk storage). Heritrix likes processor power 
>=
 in my

>=
 although
> > additional memory can somewhat improve throughput for high en=
d 
> machines.

installation

ch should get you up 
and 
> running

ive.org/articles/user_manual.html#tutorial
